entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @GOPLeader Another big shot squawk & vomit of WH talking points at Fox! Wake up Toady Kevin-Trump is lying about COVID-19 and his task force under Pence is lying. If kids and essential support teachers and workers get into crowded schools and deaths occur, squawking won’t fix it!
